General.Name: Auto& Inc.
General.Description: Auto & Inc. sells motor vehicle parts and accessories in South Korea. It offers vehicle management products, including window tinting for driver protection and air cleaning services, as well as tuning accessories; and manufactures, sources, and distributes auto parts. The company also develops an IoT commerce platform specialized for O2O-based means of transportation. Auto & Inc. was founded in 2012 and is based in Anyang, South Korea.
